item.title: Graphic video of Kirk shooting was everywhere online, showing how media gatekeeper role has changed

item.title: Another full blackout hits Cuba as the island's energy crisis worsens
item.description: A total blackout has hit Cuba, marking the latest in a series of outages blamed on aging infrastructure and fuel shortages at power plants
